findings.title: Transfer more Ether to the agent balance than it was transferred via the deposit call
findings.description: It is possible to transfer more Ether to the `agent` balance than it was transferred via the `deposit` call (`msg.value`). Moreover, the access to this feature is not limited in any way.

findings.title: Minting of unavailable tokens after this call
findings.description: Tokens minted using the previous agent will be unavailable after a specific function call.

findings.title: Minting of unavailable tokens using _cErc20 will be unavailable
findings.description: After this call tokens that were minted using `_cErc20` will be unavailable. We advise verifying that all the token minted via the passed `_cErc20` were redeemed.

findings.title: Insufficient Token Approval Handling
findings.description: If the tokenToEthSwapInput call result is less than the _minEthAmount value, annule the token approval or roll back the transaction to prevent exchange contract from withdrawing tokens afterwards.

findings.title: Supporting Ether transfer to the agent is irrelevant as working with CEther is not supported
findings.description: The contract supports Ether transfer to the agent which is unnecessary since it does not work with CEther.

findings.title: General token validation code should be moved to a separate internal method
findings.description: Token validation code should be refactored into a separate internal method for better code organization and reusability.

findings.title: Deposit, Transfer, and EnabledTokens Array Control Functions Refactoring
findings.description: The deposit, transfer, and enabledTokens array control functions can be moved to a compound-aragon-app and uniswap-aragon-app base contract.

findings.title: Incorrect Comment
findings.description: The comment must have been copied from the setAgent function and should be corrected.

findings.title: Missing isInitialized Modifier
findings.description: The smart contract is missing the isInitialized modifier which can lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Uninformative Revert Reason
findings.description: The ERROR_NOT_CONTRACT revert reason does not provide enough information as it is unclear to which address it is related.

findings.title: Exchange check should be moved to a modifier
findings.description: The exchange check logic should be refactored into a modifier for better code organization and reusability.

findings.title: Unused Constant
findings.description: The constant is not used and can be removed.
